alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 3:08PM CDT until June 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 307 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Wills Point, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Van, Edgewood, Fruitvale, Edom, Myrtle Springs, Ben Wheeler, Whitton, Jackson, Oakland, Wise, Jones, Primrose, Pruitt, Tundra, Colfax and Martins Mill. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 512 and 542. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm has a history of producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
